content:
HTA has registered the following external code systems owned by 3M. The information on these pages have been reviewed by HTA, the Financial WG and 3M. The process to have them accurately represented at terminology.hl7.org is in progress. To comment on individual 3M code systems, please do so on the corresponding JIRA ticket.

All Patient Diagnosis Related Groups (AP DRGs): https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=97456937
All Patient Refined Diagnosis Related Groups (APR DRGs): https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=97456797

Thanks,
Carol
@Jessica Snell @Ted Klein
